casebody.data:
Melesio RAMIREZ, Employee
v.
STUART PIERCE FARMS, INC., Employer, FCCI Insurance Group, Carrier No. 214P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Francisco J. Bricio, Attorney at Law, Kathrine Bricio, Attorney at Law, for Ramirez, Melesio. Trula R. Mitchell, Attorney at Law, Jack S. Holmes, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Emily Anne Smith, Attorney at Law, for Stuart Pierce Farms, Inc., et al. Marc X. Sneed, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Industrial Commission.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of July 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
